title: IN DEPTH: Elon Musk’s Dream to Bring Affordable Internet to Africa Stymied by Political Roadblocks and Greed
description: A 3D rendering of a Starlink setup. Satellite communications company SpaceX is facing challenges in Africa, where in theory a large market exists for its internet services. (Illustration by Shutterstock)

title: Social Media Catalyzed Recent Bank Failures, Paper Says
